title: Bug 5473 - ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473 - ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When the tab character is replaced with spaces in the first line so that the two lines are visually indented the same, executing ShiftLeft should shift both lines left. In the first scenario, it seems like the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left, at least up to the space character (i.e., get rid of the tab). It is also confusing if there is a stray space present because it is unclear why the text won't shift.
